channel.title: Need help quick only click if you know about linux
channel.description: hey i have a linux vps and i need answer fast on how to zip a file to move it to a new dedi and i do not know how to zip on linux so please help

item.title: Need help quick only click if you know about linux
item.dc:creator: @Coelho Coelho
item.description:
@Coelho wrote:

Use

tar -cvf "filename" "directory"
or the other way around. I'm not sure.

Read full topic
item.source: Need help quick only click if you know about linux
